select * from ( SELECT r.*,p.pay_condition FROM tbl_reservation r join tbl_payment p on r.RESERVATION_SEQ = p.RESERVATION_SEQ where userid=#{userid} and p.PAY_CONDITION='Y' order by r.reservation_seq desc )
where rownum<=5

select * from ( SELECT r.*,e.COMPFLAG,e.refund_cancle,e.refund_cancle_ok,f.DETAIL FROM tbl_reservation r join tbl_payment p on r.RESERVATION_SEQ = p.RESERVATION_SEQ join tbl_refund e on p.PAY_SEQ=e.PAY_SEQ join tbl_refundbec f on e.REFUNDBEC_SEQ = f.REFUNDBEC_SEQ where userid=#{userid} and p.PAY_CONDITION='C' order by r.reservation_seq desc )
where rownum<=5

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_reservation r join tbl_payment p on r.RESERVATION_SEQ = p.RESERVATION_SEQ join tbl_refund e on p.PAY_SEQ=e.PAY_SEQ join tbl_refundbec f on e.REFUNDBEC_SEQ = f.REFUNDBEC_SEQ where p.PAY_CONDITION='C' and refund_cancle>=#{startDay} and refund_cancle < to_Date(#{endDay})+1
and userid=#{customerId}

SELECT r.*,p.pay_seq,p.reg_date,usedmileage FROM tbl_reservation r join tbl_payment p on r.RESERVATION_SEQ = p.RESERVATION_SEQ where userid=#{userid} and p.PAY_CONDITION='Y' and p.reservation_seq=#{reservation_seq}
